title: AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel), Battery Booster Power Pack, 12V Auto Jump Box with LED Light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, 4000A peak current, includes 88Wh portable battery charger
descriptions:
Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, the ultimate power source for all your automotive needs. With a powerful 4000A peak current, this jump starter is capable of starting up to 10.0L diesel engines and any gasoline engines in just a few minutes. No more waiting around for assistance or being stranded on the road.

Equipped with a high-capacity 27800mAh battery, this jump starter is not only reliable but also portable. Its compact body allows you to take it anywhere you go, making it the perfect companion for all your outdoor adventures. Plus, with two USB charge ports and USB Quick Charge 3.0 technology, you can also use it as a portable battery charger for your mobile phones, tablets, cameras, and more. The charging speed is an impressive 75% faster than ordinary power banks, ensuring that your devices are always powered up and ready to go.

Safety is our top priority. That's why the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter comes with intelligent protection systems such as short circuit, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connection protection. The jumper clamp is designed to be sturdy and durable, while the cable length provides added convenience during use. And with the indicator and buzzer, you'll always know when you're operating it correctly.

But that's not all. This jump starter also features a multifunctional LED light with three working modes - flashlight, SOS, and strobe. Whether you're camping, facing an emergency, or simply need some extra light, this jump starter has got you covered.

With the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, you'll never have to worry about being stranded or running out of power again. It comes with everything you need - a portable battery starter, jumper cables, USB-C cable, cigarette lighter converter, carry case, and a user manual. And if you ever have any issues, our professional 24-hour online after-sales team is here to assist you.

Please note that no adapter is included, but you can use any USB type charger to charge the jump starter. Don't miss out on this powerful and reliable automotive jump starter. Get your AVAPOW Car Jump Starter today and experience the difference it makes.

Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, the ultimate automotive companion that offers maximum power and reliability. With a powerful 4000A peak current, this jump starter is capable of starting any gasoline engine and even 10.0L diesel engines in just a matter of minutes. 

Equipped with a high-capacity 27800mAh battery, this jump box is not only designed for starting vehicles but also serves as a portable battery charger. It features two USB charge ports, including a USB Quick Charge 3.0 port, allowing you to charge your devices at lightning-fast speeds. With its compact and portable design, you can take this jump starter anywhere you go, ensuring you're never left stranded with a dead battery.

Safety is our utmost priority, which is why the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter is designed with intelligent protection systems. It features protection against short circuit, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connection, providing you with peace of mind during every use. The sturdy and durable metal clamps ensure long-lasting performance, preventing any potential breakage.

In addition to its powerful capabilities, this jump starter also features a multifunctional LED light. With three working modes including flashlight, SOS, and strobe, it serves as the perfect emergency tool for any situation. The super bright LED lights provide added convenience for nighttime use, making it ideal for camping, outdoor adventures, emergencies, and travel.

Included with your purchase is the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, jumper cables, a USB-C cable, a cigarette lighter converter, a carry case, and a user manual. Our professional 24-hour online after-sales team is also available to assist you with any issues or concerns you may have.

Don't get caught off guard with a dead battery. Invest in the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter today and experience the power, reliability, and convenience it offers. Please note that no adapter is included, but you can use any of your cell phone USB type chargers to charge the jump starter.

generation_prompt_text:
Write an advertising description for the following product that will attractive to buyers. Use the existing description below as a guideline, matching it roughly in quality and level of detail. Do not include information not available in the description below. Do not directly plagiarize the description below.

---

Title: AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel), Battery Booster Power Pack, 12V Auto Jump Box with LED Light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, 4000A peak current, includes 88Wh portable battery charger

Description: Our AVAPOW 4000A Jump Starter is a Supersafe and reliable automotive jump starter offering the users maximum power. This jump box has a 4000A peak current. You can use it to start 10.0L diesel engine and any gasoline engines in a few minutes. The 4000A Peak 12V car battery pack jumper booster comes with 88Wh high capacity and portable battery charger.It designed with 27800mAh and two USB charge ports. This automotive battery jumper pack can be used anywhere for its compact body.It is equipped with type-C input and output, which enables it to supports type-C charging USB. The other outstanding thing about this best battery jump starter for the large engine is its ruggedness and super security. This jump starter cables are all made of metal clamps to prevent them from breaking in the long run.

POWERFUL & LARGE CAPACITY - AVAPOW car jump starter provides up to 4000 peak current, 27800mAh capacity can start all 12V cars (Including hybrid power), motorcycles, ATV, UTV, lawn mowers, snowmobiles, etc. easily in just a few minutes. (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel) - up to 40 times on a full charge.

INTELLIGENT PROTECTION - With intelligent protection systems such as short circuit, low battery, high temperature and reverse connection. The jumper clamp is designed to be sturdy and durable, and the cable of sufficient length is more convenient to use. The jumper box has a prompt indicator and a buzzer to indicate correct operation.

UPGRADED FAST CHARGING - Not only a lithium car starter, but also a portable car power supply with a high capacity of 27800mAh. It uses dual USB 3.0 output ports (USB 1: 5V /3A 9V /2A 12V /1.5A; USB 2: 5V / 2.4A and the Charging speed is 75% faster than ordinary mobile power. Compatible with almost all USB charging devices, including mobile phones and tablets, cameras, kindle, etc.

MULTIFUNCTIONAL LED LIGHT - This car battery jump starter features three working modes of built-in light (flashlight/SOS/strobe), which can be used as an emergency tool. Super bright LED lights provide more convenience for night use. This multifunctional flashlight is perfect for camping, outdoor, emergency, travel, etc.

WHAT YOU GET - 1 X Portable Battery Starter,1 X Jumper Cables,1 X USB-C Cable, 1 X Cigarette Lighter Converter, 1 X Carry Case,1 X User Manual, and professional 24-hour online after-sales team for any issue. Tips: No adapter included (All your cell phone USB type charger could be used to charge the jump starter.).
